title: Introducing: Driffs
content:
Australia appears to be a fertile breeding ground for new music at the moment, with a host of exciting synth and eletronic acts popping up all over the country.

Sydney based four piece Driffs are the epitome of the vibrant scene, with their upbeat, dreamily nostalgic debut tracks. Ocean Sounds is a summer surf-pop gem, with itâ€™s dazzlingly addictive hook and reverb drenched vocals, ushering in the warmer months with wonderfully sweet aplomb. On the second of their demo tracks, Wake Up, Driffs adopt a more seductive tone, whilst again basing much of the song around the splendid guitar line. Check out both tracks below, and keep up with the four piece via Facebook.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
